articles.author: Max Seddon, Edward White, Kathrin Hille, Sun Yu, Joe Leahy
articles.title: Xi Jinping to test limits of friendship with Putin on Russia state visit - Financial Times
articles.description: China’s leader also wants to assert peacemaking credentials and stabilise relations with Europe
articles.content: Days after Vladimir Putin was hit with an international warrant for alleged war crimes in Ukraine, Xi Jinpings first state visit to Moscow in four years is a demonstration of the Chinese leaders comm… [+6621 chars]
